actions.text: Must always equal or beat value of previous card on Discard.
actions.title: Play

actions.text: Play 1x card face up on Discard. Or 2+ of same value [♣7-♠7].
actions.title: If cards in hand

actions.text: Turn face-down card and play blind.
actions.title: If empty hand and no face-up cards

actions.text: Replenish hand from Draw. Should have minimum of 3 cards.
actions.title: Replenish

actions.text:
2 = Can play on any card. Any card can be played on top of it.
10 = Play on any card, clear and shuffle Discard and same player plays again.
Completing any Set of 4x e.g. [♥7-♦7-♣7-♠7] = Clear and shuffle Discard and same player plays again.

actions.text: When a player empties hand and table cards, they drop out.
actions.title: Drop Out

actions.text: Last player left is the Shithead.
